titleStmt.title: Hey ho hunt about. Or, A pretty merry meeting of young men and maids, who went to the tavern by Cupids strong aids, they drank and were merry and sang a new song, they talkt and discours'd but did no body wrong, they kindly imbrac'd, and each other did kiss, you know there could be no great harm in this. The tune is, The couragious hartulesse healths.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F[rancis]. Coles, T[homas]. Vere, and J[ohn]. Wright.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication and publisher's names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
